page.title: 04Children of the area.
page.content: Gareth Davies is nine years of age. He writes "I live in a big house. I have three sisters and three brothers. My nan owns a post office. She has been working for 33 years. My best food is pizza. I do not like curry because it is hot. Sometimes I go to my friend's house to play. He is Martin Lewis. My dad has a Humber car. I go to Stepaside School sometimes on my bike but most of the children travel by service bus which comes from Kilgetty, goes through Summerhill where I live and then goes back to Stepaside where it arrives at about 9.25 a.m. A lolly pop lady walks up the road to the school with us. At 3.25 p.m. she takes us down the road again to meet the 'bus. I have beaten the 'bus home twice on my bike. I like watching "Street Hawk" and "Knight Rider" on T.V."
